name: Ladder of the Aesir
description:
Ladder of the Aesir is a short proof-of-concept game done on the course Game Worlds at the IT university in Copenhagen. The focus was more on building a compelling setting for a game rather than actual game play.

The people who participated in this project were:
Mathias Lindberg Nielsen https://lindberg.itch.io/
Elisabeth Fraberger
Jonas Gøttrup Damsbo
Nicolaj Frederik Jensen
